{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=REC44M |asin=B01HORXQWU |newegg=9SIA25V5XZ0143 |fcc_date=06/08/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |fcc_id=ZTT-REC44M |ic_id=10233A-REC44M |type=range extender |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT;MEDIATEK, MT7621AT, 1601-AMTH, CTP4MM53, DTP47C34; |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1552-BFSL, ACMSQQKH; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615N, 1552-BFSL, ACMSQQKH; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Amped_REC44M_2.4, Amped_REC44M_5.0 |default_ip=192.168.1.240 }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800Mbps''' - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|High Power Plug-In AC2600 Wi-Fi Range Extender with MU-MIMO}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/rec44m.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Amped|model=rec44m}} "1244-01001412-50Z-ES" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. * Web Menu: http://setup.ampedwireless.com
